public class IncidentsTask

Method Detail

setLimit

public void setLimit(int limit)
Set how many incidents to return. The default is 20. Note: You might want to call this before you make a call to any of the incident tasks.

Parameters:
limit - - The number to limit to.

setSort

public void setSort(int sort)
Set how to sort the returned incidents/reports.

Parameters:
sort - - The sort value. 0 is Ascending, 1 is Descending; 0 is the default.

setOrderField

public void setOrderField(java.lang.String field)
Set the order field to use in ordering the returned incidents/reports

Parameters:
field - The field to use (incidentid|locationid|incidentdate) incidentid is the default
